<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Efficiently reads all data from \\p Ref, and writes it to this stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This operation will not invoke any copies of the source data, regardless</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of the source stream&#39;s implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns a success error code if the data was successfully written,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// otherwise returns an appropriate error code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#aa08601ded5ad31dbdd5a5262a972f479">writeStreamRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea60baadb22e80b147e4885ad16760e569">Ref</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Efficiently reads \\p Size bytes from \\p Ref, and writes it to this stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This operation will not invoke any copies of the source data, regardless</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of the source stream&#39;s implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns a success error code if the data was successfully written,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// otherwise returns an appropriate error code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#aa08601ded5ad31dbdd5a5262a972f479">writeStreamRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea60baadb22e80b147e4885ad16760e569">Ref</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Writes the object \\p Obj to the underlying stream, as if by using memcpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is up to the caller to ensure that type of \\p Obj can be safely copied</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in this fashion, as no checks are made to ensure that this is safe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns a success error code if the data was successfully written,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// otherwise returns an appropriate error code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#ae73ad246f9f1adc35f0ce49fc089b52a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#ae73ad246f9f1adc35f0ce49fc089b52a">writeObject</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;Obj) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(!std::is&#95;pointer&lt;T&gt;::value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;writeObject should not be used with pointers, to write &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;the pointed-to value dereference the pointer before calling &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;writeObject&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#abb614d7e749a1af26c1d719b28ba4fb7">writeBytes</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;Obj), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Writes an array of objects of type T to the underlying stream, as if by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// using memcpy.  It is up to the caller to ensure that type of \\p Obj can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// be safely copied in this fashion, as no checks are made to ensure that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this is safe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns a success error code if the data was successfully written,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// otherwise returns an appropriate error code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a1e5febb5c471f88c785519a211871b01"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a1e5febb5c471f88c785519a211871b01">writeArray</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;</a> Array) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Array.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Array.size() &gt; UINT32&#95;MAX / </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>))</span></CodeLine>
